CustomField.formula: If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c, "VA 15"), First_Payment__c + 210, If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c,"VA 30"),First_Payment__c + 210, If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c,"FHA 15"), Closed_Date__c + 210, If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c,"FHA 30"),Closed_Date__c + 210, If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c, "VA15"), First_Payment__c + 210, If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c,"VA30"),First_Payment__c + 210, If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c,"FHA15"),Closed_Date__c + 210, If(ISPICKVAL(Loan_Program__c,"FHA30"),Closed_Date__c + 210, NULL))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This represents 210 days from the Closed Date for the next FHA/VA refi. 6 Payment Rule may impact this date. Add 1 extra for safety and 2 extra days for Rocket. Loan Program must reflect FHA 15, FHA 30, VA 15, or VA 30.
CustomField.label: Next FHA/VA Refi Close Date
